attributes.action: take steps to remove the estimated 2 million cars on the road without valid road tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evidence shows many drivers without road tax are probably driving with no insurance, no MoT and no driving licence. Many will also be disqualified drivers who pose a danger to the public. All police forces to be issued with additional electronic devices to recognise car number plates - to be paid for by fines and increased road tax revenue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
